thread.title: Lockton adds team of experts to Signature Client Group

author: cnbc.com
title: Lockton adds team of experts to Signature Client Group
text:
NEW YORK, Feb. 19, 2018 /PRNewswire/ -- As a complement to Lockton's Signature Client Group, Lockton has added a team of industry leaders to help high net worth clients manage their personal risk exposures. The Private Risk team is led by Lynn Rasmussen, Shirley Gordon and Jill Arnold Bull. Their collective skillset enables Lockton to identify and help manage the often complex and sophisticated personal risk exposures of these clients.
The team focuses on working with high net worth clients on a global basis, helping them identify and manage their unique liability risks across a wide range of holdings commonly associated with high-profile professional athletes, celebrities and Fortune 500 CEOs. They partner with wealth advisors, trust and estate attorneys, business managers, and other trusted advisors of these individuals and their families.
"We are excited to deepen and expand this capability within our firm and deliver it to more clients across Lockton. Many clients look to Lockton to solve their risk issues across their entire spectrum of commercial and personal risks. We are now better positioned to respond to those needs. Best of all, the team brings the 'client first' service model, which is the hallmark of Lockton, to private risk," said Tim Ryan, chief operating officer of Lockton Northeast.

About Lockton
Lockton is a global professional services firm with 6,500 Associates who advise clients on protecting their people, property and reputations. Lockton has grown to become the world's largest privately held, independent insurance broker by helping clients achieve their objectives. For nine consecutive years, Business Insurance magazine has recognized Lockton as a " Best Place to Work in Insurance ."
